mapelements

类 Continent

  • java.lang.Object
    • mapelements.Continent

  • public class Continent
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the class for defining Continent.

    A continent can include several countries, and contains all information of a continent.

    • 构造器概要

        Method to get continent's name.

        public void setName(java.lang.String continentName)
        Method to initialize or change continent's name, is used when creating a new continent or changing an existing contient's name.
        参数:
        continentName - continent's name

        public int getControlNum()
        Method to get continent's control number.
        返回:

        Method to set continent's control number.

      • addCountry

        public void addCountry(Country country)
        Method to add a country to countryList.
        参数:
        country - new country object

      • deleteCountry

        public void deleteCountry(Country country)
        Method to delete a country from countryList.
        参数:
        country - country object to delete

      • getCountryList

        public java.util.ArrayList<Country> getCountryList()
        Method to get the list of countries which belong to this continent.
        返回:
        country list of this continent

      • getOwner

        public Player getOwner()
        Method to get the owner of this continent.
        返回:
        the owner of this continent or null if no owner

      • checkOwner

        public void checkOwner()
        Method to check if this continent has been owned by one player.

      • findCountry

        public Country findCountry(java.lang.String countryName)
        Method to find a country in this continent.
        参数:
        countryName - the name of the country
        返回:
        the country object found in this continent or null if can't find
